NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Suite 1119
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
OFFICE OF THE VICE PRESIDENT
March 20, 1963
Mrs. Marion Cornell
Associate Director
School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
5757 Neckel
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Mrs. Corwell:
Since Mr. Hill is out of town at the present time, your letter of
March l8 has come to my attention.
Mr. Campion*s address is Director, Division of Educational Communications,
New York State Department of Education, Albany, New York - Mr. lyier* s is
President, ETV Committee - Arkansas, 1010 West 3rd Street, Little Ro'ck,
Arkansas.
Secretary to Harold Hill
